intro: Peucedanum stenocarpum var. catalaunicum, commonly known as the Catalaunicum茴香, is a variant of the stenocarpum form of the same species. It is a flowering plant in the Apiaceae family, characterized by its distinctive umbellate inflorescences. The plant typically grows in rocky or arid environments, showing adaptability to harsh conditions. Its leaves are finely divided and aromatic, often used in traditional herbal medicine. The flowers are small and white, contributing to its ornamental value in certain horticultural settings.
